fieldUpdates.formula: IF( TEXT(CycleTime__c) == null, null,IF(TEXT(Date_Critical_Data_Delivery_Ship_RFT__c)!= null, Date_Critical_Data_Delivery_Ship_RFT__c - License_to_Customer__c , 40 - CycleTime__c ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Delta drop dead field update
Next Phase Date Field Update for closed
Next Phase field Update for won opp

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( CycleTime__c == null, null, IF(CycleTime__c > 0, IF((40 - CycleTime__c ) >= 0,1,0), null))
fieldUpdates.name: OTD field update
Offering sales to be unchecked on cloned
Offering to be unchecked oppty is cloned

fieldUpdates.formula:
Case (StageName , "Closed Won", case (Record_Type_Name__c, "BGA OE",1, "BGA AM",1, 0), "Negotiation/Review", case (Record_Type_Name__c , "BGA OE",0.75, "BGA AM",0.75, 0), "Proposal/Price Quote", case (Record_Type_Name__c , "BGA OE",0.50, "BGA AM",0.50, 0),
0)

Were Value Tools used in the pursuit

rules.fullName: Active Child Opptys when stage is Open
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISBLANK( Parent_Opportunity__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Parent_Opportunity__c ))), OR(Is_Follow_On_Opportunity__c = True, Is_Follow_On_Opportunity__c = False), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Prospecting'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Cultivate'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Launch'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Propose'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Offer/Negotiate/Close')), OR(ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, 'ATR'), ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, 'BGA'), ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, 'D&S')))

rules.fullName: Active checkbox to be Unchecked
Appendix Engineer Review Date Update
BGA Operator Set Active to False
Business Contact Review Date Update
Check sales survey qualified based on qualified sales survey field
Close Date to Actual Close Date
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed = true, OR( ISPICKVAL(SBU__c ,"ATR"), ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, "BGA"), ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, "D&S") ), OR( ISCHANGED(CloseDate), CloseDate != ATR_Actual_Close_Date__c, ISNULL( ATR_Actual_Close_Date__c ) ) )

rules.fullName: Close Date to Actual Close Date Blank
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed = false, OR( ISPICKVAL(SBU__c ,"ATR"), ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, "BGA"), ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, "D&S") ), not ISNULL( ATR_Actual_Close_Date__c ) )

rules.fullName: DS Commercial Helicopter
rules.formula: Or( Text( Account.Market_Name__c ) = "Helicopters", Text( Platform__r.Platform_Type__c ) = "Helicopter" )

rules.fullName: DS Commercial Helicopter Not
rules.formula: Not Or( Text( Account.Market_Name__c ) = "Helicopters", Text( Platform__r.Platform_Type__c ) = "Helicopter" )

rules.fullName: DS Offset
rules.formula: or( text( Offset_Status__c ) = "Contractual Offset or Industrial Requirements", text( Offset_Status__c ) = "Potential Offset or Industrial Requirements" )

rules.fullName: DS Offset Not
rules.formula: not or( text( Offset_Status__c ) = "Contractual Offset or Industrial Requirements", text( Offset_Status__c ) = "Potential Offset or Industrial Requirements" )

rules.fullName: DS Offset Status
Email Notification to ATR Opportunity Owner
rules.description: Email Notification to ATR Opportunity Owner when the Revenue begin date is in the past and the opportunity is not in Stage Closed
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(SBU__c,'ATR') , NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Offer/Negotiate/Close'), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Closed Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Closed Lost'), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Closed Channel Partner'), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Closed Won'))), OR($RecordType.Name = 'AM Catalog', $RecordType.Name == 'AM Complex', $RecordType.Name == 'AM Standard'), TODAY() == Revenue_Start_Date__c+1)

HAPP%2FMPP Closed Won Contract Completion Notification

rules.description: WF for follow up customer when opportunity stage as closed won

rules.fullName: Opportunity Cloned blank the fields
rules.formula: ISCLONE()

rules.fullName: Opportunity Close Date to Stage Closed Date
rules.formula: AND(IsClosed = TRUE, ISCHANGED(IsClosed) )

rules.fullName: Opportunity MPM license formula field updation
Opportunity Notes change
rules.description: Notification to Opportunity owner and Co-owner when Notes is changed
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId ='01230000000bN7l', ISCHANGED( Opportunity_Notes__c ) )

rules.fullName: Opportunity Owner change
rules.description: Notification to Opportunity owner and Co-owner when Owner is changed
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId ='01230000000bN7l', ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) )

rules.fullName: Opportunity Reminder Notification
rules.booleanFilter: 1 and 2 and 3 AND 17 AND ((5 and 12 and 13 and ((7 and 8) or (10 and 11))) or (4 and 9 and 14) or (6 and 16 and 15 and 11))
rules.description: As a Sales Representative/Opportunity Owner, I need to have a reminder e-mailed after 3 days after the opportunity was closed Won or Lost, to notify me to send the Sales Survey, if it have not done so already so that I won't forget to send the Sales Surve

rules.fullName: Opportunity closure notification to FSE and Manager

criteriaItems.value: Closed Won,Closed Lost,Closed Cancelled,Closed Channel Partner

rules.description: Opportunity closure notification to FSE and Manager

rules.fullName: Opportunity creation notification to FSE and Manager
rules.description: Opportunity creation notification to FSE and Manager

rules.fullName: Opportunity owner manager email
rules.formula: Owner.Manager.Email <> null

rules.fullName: Opportunity update FSE Initiator Manager Email
rules.description: Opportunity update FSE Initiator Manager Email
rules.formula: OR(ISCHANGED( FSEintiator_name_Leadmapped__c), ISNEW())

rules.fullName: Opportunity%3A Tech Sales
rules.formula: and( text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", not isnull( Tech_Sales_Product__c ), not isblank( Tech_Sales_Product__c ) )

rules.fullName: Package checkbox update
Package checkbox updates
Parent Campaign Auto Populate
rules.description: Autopopulates the Parent Campaign field on Opportunities

rules.fullName: Parent opportunity blank
rules.formula: Parent_Opportunity__c = null

rules.fullName: Phase 2%3A Detailed Negotiation
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(StageName) && TEXT(StageName ) == 'Phase 2: Detailed Negotiation' && $RecordType.DeveloperName == 'M&PM SIM Licensing'

rules.fullName: Populate Annualized Years
Probability Copy
rules.formula: OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(PWin__c), ISCHANGED(PGo__c))

rules.fullName: Push Product Date
Send an email for Go direct Opportunities
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Prospecting'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Cultivate'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Launch'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Propose'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Offer/Negotiate/Close')), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Type__c, 'Renewal'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'GoDirect Cabin'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'GoDirect Cockpit')), (CloseDate = TODAY() + 90))

rules.fullName: Send an email to the Lead Creator when the Opportunity is closed%2E

criteriaItems.value: Closed Won,Closed Lost,Closed Cancelled,Closed Channel Partner

rules.description: For Opportunities that have the FSE Intiator field populated, send an email to the Lead Creator when the Opportunity is closed.

rules.fullName: Send an email to the Opportunity owner when fields are changed
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Amount), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "D&S Sales API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "CRM Admin" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Sales Developer" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "System Administrator" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Sales Admin" ), LastModifiedById <> Owner.Id )

rules.fullName: Send an email to the Opportunity owner when stage is changed
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(StageName), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "D&S Sales API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "CRM Admin" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Sales Developer" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "System Administrator" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Sales Admin" ), LastModifiedById <> Owner.Id )

rules.fullName: Survey Not Sent Rep Warning
rules.formula: (RecordType.Name == "BGA Operator"||RecordType.Name == "BGA AM") && Win_Loss_Amount__c > 40000 && End_User_Country__c == "USA" && (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")||ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost")) && ISPICKVAL(Sales_Type__c,"Retrofit") && Account.BGA_Account__c = false && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'HAPP'))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'HAPP/MPP'))
